/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene day in a small town. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene below. The street, lined with power lines, stretches out into the distance, inviting one to explore further. On either side of the street, houses and buildings stand in quiet repose, their facades bathed in the soft light of the day. The perspective of the image is from ground level, looking down the street towards the horizon, giving a sense of depth and distance. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the grass and trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall effect is one of tranquility and simplicity, a snapshot of everyday life in a small town.
